document_data.name: Noska Ur'gray
document_data.mainbody: '''Noska Ur'gray''' was an enforcer of the [[Xanathar's Thieves' Guild]] in [[Waterdeep]] during the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Noska was the chief enforcer for the [[Xanathar]]. He lived inside the [[beholder]]'s lair. During the gladiator tournaments organized by his master, Noska managed the fighters.
document_data.History:
Once Noska lost his left hand and forearm to a [[green slime]]'s attack. He replaced the missing part with a heavy crossbow attached to the stump.

In [[1492 DR]],{{WDH-time}} if the [[Xanathar]] managed to obtain the ''[[Stone of Golorr]]'', he entrusted the Stone to [[Grinda Garloth]]. She agreed to take custody of the Stone but changed her mind and decided to use it for herself, ordering her [[familiar]] to hide it. Noska led a band of the Xanathar's minions to besiege Grinda in order to steal back the Stone.
document_data.Relationship: Noska was one of the most trusted underlings of the Xanathar.
